name: Auto Arrange Frames
description:
Automatically arrange your frames in the left side layer-list based on their position (x, y) on the canvas.

  • Arrange from left to right (horizontal arrangement)
  • Arrange from top to bottom (vertical arrangement)


This will be useful if you want your frames' order to be neatly arranged in prototypes or while exporting it as PDF. If you like the plugin, please support my work here- https://www.buymeacoffee.com/saurabhs
